I'm having problems pinging any other machines (windows or linux) by their hostname, and similarly they cannot ping my machine by my hostname.  Is there something I "need to"or can do to make my ubuntu machine compliant with however windows networks are managed?
pinging the ip works.  But out ips are not static.
